title: Explain End-of-Lease Options
description: A customer's lease is ending in 90 days. An agent calls to explain their options.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their expiring lease details.
Clearly explain the three primary options: 1) Return the vehicle, 2) Purchase the vehicle for the residual value, 3) Lease or purchase a new vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear and concise explanation of all options.

tasks.description: Schedule a pre-inspection to check for any excess wear and tear before the lease return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent offers and schedules a complimentary pre-inspection.
